*Presented at [Digital Humanities Summer Institute (DHSI)](https://dhsi.org/) in Montreal, QC, in June 2025.*

:::{.def}

This presentation gave a synopsis of the course ***Coding fundamentals for humanists*** offered at [Digital Humanities Summer Institute (DHSI)](https://dhsi.org/) from June 2^nd^ to June 6^th^ 2025.

The course covered core concepts of programming languages, an introduction to [JupyterLab](https://jupyter.org/), the basics of Python, API querying, and web scraping. The format was a combination of lectures, hands-on exercises with and without [large language models (LLMs)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Llm), and projects relevant to the attendees academic research.

:::
